reviewText: This is just hilarious!  It helps if you have ever read an Asterix and Obelix book.

This movie is great!!! I got it as a gift for my husband. He use to watch it when he was little. It's in it's original format. English dialogue! Was so glad I could find this for him! He was very happy. Only thing is it looks like the cover looks printed out and possibly the cover on the disc was homemade as well. It still works great and everything. I just found it a little odd... I don't know if its suppose to look that way or not.

I loved this movie as a child and was so happy to own it on DVD! It's in its original quality--no remastering or "polishing" as far as I can tell. The movie is charming and funny and any Asterix fan would love it.
